item.title: Top 10 best air cooler in India
item.dc:creator: toptenkart@gmail.com
item.description: Looking for Best cooler for this hot summer? Don’t worry Here is list of Top 10 Best Air cooler in India which we made for you by researching product reviews and Various factors. Bajaj PX 97 TORQUE (HC) 36L Personal Air Cooler with Honeycomb Pads, Turbo Fan Technology, Powerful Air Throw and 3-Speed Control, White […]
item.content:encoded:
Looking for Best cooler for this hot summer? Don’t worry Here is list of Top 10 Best Air cooler in India which we made for you by researching product reviews and Various factors.

Bajaj PX 97 TORQUE (HC) 36L Personal Air Cooler with Honeycomb Pads, Turbo Fan Technology, Powerful Air Throw and 3-Speed Control, White


☆☆☆☆☆ 4.2/5

View Price

Product Highlights

  1. Castor wheel for easy mobility. Cord effective length 1.5
  2. Capacity: 36 Litres; Ideal for room size of upto 150 Sq Ft. Suitable for all climates and coastal regions
  3. Honeycomb cooling media, easily removable pads; 3 Side cooling pad for enhanced performance
  4. 3 way speed control; Quite Performance; Four way air deflection
  5. Always allow for Cross-Ventilation in your area / room, else cooler won’t work effectively

Symphony Ice Cube 27 Personal Air Cooler for Home with Powerful Fan, 3-Side Honeycomb Pads, i-Pure Technology and Low Power Consumption (27L)


☆☆☆☆☆ 3.6/5

View Price

Product Highlights

  1. Coverage Area: This high-performance air cooler is suitable for rooms up to 16 square meters of the area under ideal conditions
  2. Clean Air with i-Pure Technology: With multistage filter it combats air pollution, odor-causing microorganisms, and allergies to give you fresh air.
  3.  Low Power Consumption: This energy-saving cooler for room uses only 170 watts
  4. Tank Capacity: When it comes to water capacity, this cooler has a 27-liter tank and a water level indicator to let you know when to refill it
  5. Powerful Blower: The high-speed blower provides cool air instantly, so now enjoy your summers comfortably
  6. Easy-to-Use: Ergonomically designed dial knobs make it easy to operate the cooler while adding to its modern and elegant appearance

Bajaj Coolest Frio Personal Air Cooler – 23L, White


☆☆☆☆☆ 3.4/5

View Price

Product Highlights

  1. Hexacool Technology : Specially Designed Cooling Media With Hexagonal Design, Delivering Maximum Cooling With Minimum Water Consumption
  2. Product Dimensions (Lxbxh): 44.5 Cm X 34.0 Cm X 78.0 Cm.Air Delivery Average (m3/hr.): 1000. Air Delivery Peak (m3/hr.):2600
  3. Typhoon Blower Technology : Blower Based Technology For Quick And Efficent Cooling
  4. Ice Chamber : Ice Compartments To Store Ice Cubes For Improved Cooling Experience
  5. Capacity: 23 Litres; Ideal For Room Size Of Upto 150 Sq Ft. Suitable For All Climates And Costal Regions
  6. Powerful Air Throw : Powerful Air Throw For Best Reach Of Air At Long Distance
  7. 3 Speed Control : To Adjust Air Flow According To The Requirement

☆☆☆☆☆ 3.5/5

View Price

Product Highlights

  1. Elegant, Slim & Stylish Aesthetic 22 Litres Water Tank Capacity, Ergonomically designed control panel with 3 speed control & swing options. Wider & larger window for better air spread
  2. Water level indicator Motorized vertical louver movement Auto fill Ice chamber for extra cooling Castor wheel Honey Comb for effective cooling
  3. Inverter Compatible, Power Consumption – 130W Air Delivery -1400m3/hr, 230 volts ac 50hz
  4. Delivers Fresh, Filtered Cool Air, Green Cooling

V-Guard Arido P22 H Aircooler | 22 Litre | Air Delivery -1100 m3/h


☆☆☆☆☆ 3.5/5

View Price

Product Highlights

  1. POWERFUL AIR DELIVERY: Best-in-class | Air Delivery-1100 m3/h | Air throw distance – 7.6 metre
  2. TANK CAPACITY: 22 L | Uni-drip flow water distribution | Easy to read Water level Indicator
  3. ULTRA CONVENIENT:  Wide voltage working range (160V ~ 270V) | Inveter compatible| Aerodynamically balanced body| 3 Speed Setting | Easy to read Water level Indicator
  4. EFFICIENT: Antifungal cellulose honeycomb cooling pads| distribution| 4 way mobility| Tetra air flow cooling| Ice chamber for enhanced cooling| Corrosion resistant blower
  5. Product Dimension – 40 x 31 x 77.2 (cm)

Air Cooler Buying Guide

1. Airflow Capacity

Airflow is measured in CFM cubic feet per minute How to calculate CFM | CFM= (Room size x room height) / 2

2. Type of Cooling Pads

Thickness of cooling pad is very important factor when it comes to cooling effect Also there are two types of cooling pads cellulose and Aspen type. Cellulose ones are low maintenance high cost pads while Aspen are cheaper with high maintenance.

3. Capacity of Water Tank

As Cooler uses Evaporative cooling it is very necessary factor while choosing Air cooler 30-60 L air coolers are ideal ones.

item.content:encoded:
Cloth drying stands furnish usefulness with helpful use. To pick the best that suits you, the stands are accessible in different plans and sizes. They furnish you with adequate room for simple drying and are reasonable to be set inside and outside according to your prerequisite. To save space and work with accommodation, we have recorded the absolute Top 10 best cloth drying stands in India.

4.5/5

Interesting points While Buying Clothes Drying Rack:

  1. Type of Cloth Drying Racks – It relies upon your idealness, regardless of whether you are searching for a divider mounted, unattached, rooftop holders, or others. Decide on the one that fits well in your home and your prerequisite.
  2. Open air or Indoor material drying rack.
    It ought to be foldable and simple to keep up with.
  3. The Material of the fabric drying rack ought to be sturdy.
    Size of the fabric drying stand.
  4. Do check the most extreme weight holding limit of the stand.
    It should be sufficiently solid.
  5. The fabric drying rack ought to be marked.
    Look at the cost of the garments drying rack.
